title: Creamy Caesar salad
ingredients: ['6 cloves garlic, peeled', '8-10 tablespoons mayonnaise', '5 anchovy fillets, minced', '6 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese, divided', '1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 teaspoon Dijon mustard', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', 'salt and pepper to taste', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '250g day-old bread, cubed', '1 romaine lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces']
